summary: Implements forward-direction template matching for quantum circuits, processing an initial mapping and configuration to discover all occurrences of a template subgraph within a larger circuit graph. Manages candidate nodes, traverses successors, respects blocked configurations, and updates argument indices to produce a collection of valid matches.
business_intent: Facilitates automated detection of reusable sub-circuit patterns to enable quantum circuit optimizations such as gate reduction, fusion, or replacement during transpilation.
